item.description:
For practice, we will provide you with a paddle and a PFD (Personal Floatation Device) if you don't have your own. We suggest you bring a watter bottle to drink during practice and wear;

  • Water shoes or footwear that you don't mind getting wet. You will not need to step in the water but some water gets into the boat
  • Weather appropriate clothing, we practice in the rain and cold weather. A water resistant jacket/windbreaker is a good idea during the spring so your upper body doesn't get too wet from wind spray and the splash off the paddles.
  • Optional- hat and/or sunglasses and sun block
  • You may want to bring dry clothes to change into after practice if the weather is cold

The first practice is free. If you like it and ant to consider joining the club we will give you more information about current club dues and race entry fees.

Parking is behind the shopping plaza. Walk down the gravel driveway to the boat house.

For additional information please check out our website www.oceanstatedragonboat.org or e-mail us at info@oceanstatedragons.org
item.how_to_find_us: Park behind the Job Lot and walk down to the pavillion
item.name: Paddling on the pond
